description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0460 ( Denial or Rejection Code)
name: v2 Denial or Rejection Code

text.div:
Denial or Rejection Code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
0 Line item not denied or rejectedadded v2.4
1 Line item denied or rejectedadded v2.4
2 Line item is on a multiple-day claim. The line item is not denied or rejected, but occurs on a day that has been denied or rejected.added v2.4
